socketedItems.secDescrText: Create a Tornado that hinders and repeatedly damages enemies around it. socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that hit enemies, causing them to gain bonuses while you have resonance of all three elements, and to grant resonance of elements other than the highest one in a hit.
